channel.title: Need Client Background Help!
channel.description: Ok, does anyone know any programs like paint but better that i can use to make custom backgrounds and such. I have GIMP but i don't know how to use. If anyone has GIMP can anyone tell me how to use it like set custom text's and stuff.

erm… GIMP is REALLY simple to use and adobe photoshop or fireworks are probablly the best in my opnion but they are pretty much the same as GIMP
